posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

4/11/22 - 4/17/22
Issue - V98
Current Release: 1.8.1

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Follow the #30daysofStreamlit challenge on Twitter or LinkedIn!
  • ICYMI- Listen to the Tech Twitter Space Streamlit discussion with @randyzwitch @Amanda_Kelly and @dataprofessor
  • Find and fix memory leaks in your apps with these 3 tips from @gmerticariu
  • Learn how to build a Real-time live data dashboard in this tutorial by @1littlecoder

Featured Content

  • Hack Streamlit to add keyboard shortcuts & copy to clipboard @andfanilo
  • Striking Distance Creator
  • CryptoBase @Japan745

  • Data-Driven Stock Market Web App with Python, Streamlit, Pandas and Yfinance
  • The Pythonic Way of Becoming a Sudoku Master
  • NLP MLops Project With DagsHub — Deploy Your Streamlit App On AWS EC2 Instance — Part 2
